channel.title: Epsilion 1.0
channel.description:
[center][b]Hello, somedays ago i came back intro RSPS and still had the DDS-spec source + client on my usb so i decide to code it and make it beter then it already is. Im not realy working together because i cant work with ppl trough like teamvieuwer its so anoying. Im going to redo all skills. Im using delta because its easyer to code and if you got the combat + dupes fixed then its a realy good base.
Update Log:
March 20 2011 - Fixed agility heights 2 + 3 they didnt show up same for all other heights 2 + 3 March 20 2011 - Started with an clean client (other was bugged) March 20 2011 - Redone herblore 99% - No interfaces like RS March 20 2011 - Redone farming 50% - No growing plants just using seed on patch and recive an random amount of herbs (grimy) March 19 2011 - Added Godwars Map - Interface - Killcount room + Bosses + Drops March 19 2011 - Added some new NpcDialogue's March 19 2011 - Added timer to skillcape so you cant walk while doing an skillcape emote March 19 2011 - Added Swat's emote system + Skillcape emotes done
More updates done but fergot what will add more later
Picture of crafting:
This also works for Emerald, Ruby, Diamond, Dragonstone and Onxy
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/1zf4n6r.jpg[/img]
Picture of herblore:
This also works with other potions like Super Strength, Super Attack and Super Defence and ofc more.
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/6dr5aw.jpg[/img]
Picture of the skillcape timer
Like you see on all servers when ur doing an skillcape emote u can walk and the gfx is still there so i made this time on the skillcapes that u cant walk while doing it.
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/15czo28.jpg[/img]
Picture of 100% gnome agility course
Trying to make the willderness one work too asap. At all objects it got the right animations too
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/11wgfgg.jpg[/img]
Picture of rushing:
Almost flawless rushing?
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/35057hx.jpg[/img][/b][/center]

item.title: Epsilion 1.0
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

I agree with Rash, I don’t think you should use Epsilion as a name. Try to think of something creative that isn’t already being used by another server.

[quote=“lover854, post:17, topic:387330”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=483132.msg3538555#msg3538555 date=1300697903]
This may be construed as “Negative”, but I want you to think of it as constructive. Try making crafting full, add in the interfaces for making chaps and such, just using the “useitemon” method isn’t very impressive.
[/quote]
Already got with dhide and leather cant figure out yet the interfaces for amulet/herblore + make like custom onces[/quote]Mendorphin’s RSPS Project Tools has a lot of lists for things, including interface Id’s ;D

OT:
Goodluck with the server, looks pretty good so far. I’ll be checking in on this every once in a while to see what you’ve added.

Read full topic

item.title: Epsilion 1.0
item.dc:creator: @k_l_4_w_s k l 4 w s
item.description:
@k_l_4_w_s wrote:

I like it. Although, You don’t show enough information.
More pics (Nobody leeches servers without pictures tbh)
BUT, you should also do a lleeeeettttllle more work then what you did before a so called, “Release”.
I hope you can take criticism.

Read full topic

item.title: Epsilion 1.0
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:16, topic:387330”][quote author=lover854 link=topic=483132.msg3538354#msg3538354 date=1300680554]Almost flawless rushing?

[/b][/center][/quote]

Except you hit 55 and his health bar hasn’t decreased at all.[/quote]
because the test acc had 999999 hp

Andrew Ferguson:

This may be construed as “Negative”, but I want you to think of it as constructive. Try making crafting full, add in the interfaces for making chaps and such, just using the “useitemon” method isn’t very impressive.

Already got with dhide and leather cant figure out yet the interfaces for amulet/herblore + make like custom onces

Read full topic

item.title: Epsilion 1.0
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Yay DeltaScape…

Your goal has been done with this base probably more times than any human being can count. If you want a real learning experience, try constructing something out of a base that doesn’t have all the work done for you.

Read full topic

[center][b]Hello, somedays ago i came back intro RSPS and still had the DDS-spec source + client on my usb so i decide to code it and make it beter then it already is.
